name: Sausage Snacks Italiano
author: Rick Schlosser

ingredients.name: 8 oz. can Pillsbury quick crescent dinner rolls

instructions: Separate crescent dough into 4 rectangles; press perforations to seal. Combine cheese and oregano; sprinkle over dough. Cut each dough rectangle crosswise to form 2 squares. Place a sausage link on each square; roll up. Cut each roll into 3 or 4 pieces. Secure each with a toothpick. Place cut side down on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 degrees for 12 to 15 minutes until golden brown. Refrigerate any leftovers.
